content: Yo! My name is JDCBot and I neew to check your information before start...!
Nice one {first_name}! I am pleased to confirm that your details have been successfully registered to my system. Hope to be useful to you!
What would you like to talk about?
Weather is a nice way to start!
Please tell me your location to give you an accurate prediction.

I've seen that near {city} at {datetime}, located at {elevation}m above sea level, temperature is {temperature}C with {humidity}% of humidity and a pressure of {pressure}hpa. There are also winds {wind_speed}m/s.
Now that you know how weather data works with me you can send me your location whenever you want to check the weather ;)
Nice choose! Which music style do you prefer?
Smart choose! Which is your favourite genre?
Smart choose! Which is your favourite genre?
If you need to contact my developer, type 'DEVELOPER'
My name is Josep, please send me an email to 'josep.de.cid@gmail.com'
